author: gaydetector3000
body:
FLT - Drone Delivery Company 

Been pumping out patents lately and signing military and avionics contracts. As soon as their drones are airborne they will be #1 in the Drone Delivery operation. Prepared for a huge upside soon enough. 

This stock is primed for takeoff… I’m talking long-term holding, 5yrs, 10yrs. My price target currently is 10$ but that could change in an instant if they get interest from Amazon or a large cap company like that

author: Light-of-Liberty
body: Do yourself a favor and pick up a handful of FLT when you get a chance. Drop Tesla until you can afford a whole one.... just try to simplify a little bit
